page.title: 14Building Survey
page.content:
On the 26 June 1985 we went to do a building survey.We walked from Townsend Way to Morborne Road.We saw nine bungalows and forty-three detached houses.We saw farmland and we drew a map of part of the village of Folksworth.
Yellow group had to do a building survey.I had to do the tally chart of buildings seen in Folksworth. Here are my results: detached house......125 detached bungalows...25 semi-detached house..35 semi-bungalow.........9 terraced house.......38 flats................12 cottages..............0 farm buildinds........2 other.................7 total...............253
